input_email_body:
Subject: 

Hello support team, I encountered a problem with the data analytics platform where the investments optimization dashboard froze unexpectedly My name is David Kim.. This may be related to a Cassandra 4.0 database connection problem. After attempting to restart the system and verify the network connections, the issue still exists You can reach me at fatima.farsi@help.com.. I would greatly appreciate your assistance in addressing this issue promptly.
